body_html: I have nvidia-390 and this work around with LD_LIBRARY_PATH has helped me fix the import error problem, but I still have another issue: When I run nvidia-smi, I get zsh: command not found: nvidia-smi but I have all the drivers installed and tensorflow running fine. any ideas?
body_text: I have nvidia-390 and this work around with LD_LIBRARY_PATH has helped me fix the import error problem, but I still have another issue: When I run nvidia-smi, I get zsh: command not found: nvidia-smi but I have all the drivers installed and tensorflow running fine. any ideas?
body: I have nvidia-390 and this work around with LD_LIBRARY_PATH has helped me fix the import error problem, but I still have another issue: When I run `nvidia-smi`, I get `zsh: command not found: nvidia-smi` but I have all the drivers installed and tensorflow running fine. any ideas?
